door_opens.speaker: Narrator
door_opens.text: The cafe door opens with its familiar chime, but this time the figure standing in the doorway makes your heart skip a beat.

mother_enters.speaker: Mother
mother_enters.text: *Her eyes bright and cheeks rosy with health* My dear child... look at what you've built here.

player_surprise.speaker: Narrator
player_surprise.text: Your mother stands before you - not the frail, bedridden woman you left behind, but vibrant and full of life. The change is remarkable.

mother_well.speaker: Mother
mother_well.text: *She laughs softly* Yes, my dear. The doctors couldn't explain it. The moment you took over the cafe and bonded with... *she glances at your dragon* ...with your companion, I began to improve.

mother_missed.speaker: Mother
mother_missed.text: *She embraces you tightly* And I you, my brave child. Every letter you sent, every story about the cafe and your dragon friend... they gave me strength.

dragon_approach.speaker: Narrator
dragon_approach.text: Your dragon, now fully grown and magnificent, approaches Mother with an unusual reverence - head bowed, wings folded close.

mother_dragon_reaction.speaker: Mother
mother_dragon_reaction.text: *She reaches out to touch the dragon's snout, tears forming* Oh, little one... you've grown so beautiful. Just like... *she catches herself*

player_curious.speaker: Narrator
player_curious.text: There's something in Mother's eyes - a depth of recognition, of memory, that seems far too personal for someone meeting a dragon for the first time.

choices.text: Mother, do you know something about my dragon?

mother_deflects.speaker: Mother
mother_deflects.text: *She straightens, composing herself* There's so much I need to tell you. Things I should have told you long ago. But first... *she looks around the cafe* ...show me everything. Show me the life you've built here.

tour_begins.speaker: Narrator
tour_begins.text: You spend the afternoon showing Mother every corner of Dragon Haven Cafe - the kitchen, the dining room, the ingredient garden, the zones you've explored.

mother_pride.speaker: Mother
mother_pride.text: *Her voice thick with emotion* You've done more than I ever dreamed. This place... it's alive again. And your dragon... the bond between you two... *she trails off*

mother_promise.speaker: Mother
mother_promise.text: Soon, my dear. Soon I will tell you everything. About the egg in the cellar. About our family. About why you were always meant to be here.

end_scene.speaker: Narrator
end_scene.text: Mother squeezes your hand, a lifetime of secrets swimming in her eyes. Whatever she has to say, it will change everything you thought you knew.
